body.name: COOFANDY Men's Casual Button Down Short Sleeve Shirt Band Collar Shirts Textured Beach Summer Shirt
features: LIGHTWEIGHT SHORT SLEEVE SHIRT - The short sleeve button down shirt is perfect for spring, summer and autumn. Mens lightweight casual shirt is skin-friendly, no shrinkage, wrinkle free and no ironing required, giving you a more comfortable and durable wearing experience. New fabrics can bring you a cool feeling when worn on your body, especially in summer.

BANDED COLLAR SHORT SLEEVE SHIRT — Men's casual ribbed shirt features banded collar, button closure, superb stitching. Soild button up shirt provide comfort and breathable experience especially in summer, Whether at the beach or indoors, a comfortable shirt always comes in handy.

CASUAL SHORT SLEEVE SHIRT - COOFANDY grandly launches new beach shirts for the season, using new fabrics that are more breathable, lighter and more comfortable than ever before. The beach summer shirts for men has the exquisite craft, lightly tapered through the waist for a tailored look. Match with solid t-shirts, beach shorts, suit pants and jeans to round out your look.

APPLICABLE OCCASIONS - Men's short sleeve lightweight shirts is perfect for business, work wear, club wear, party, ball, bar, dates, leisure time, holiday, vacation, casual daily wear, outdoor activities like beach, climbing, camping, hunting, fishing, travelling, street look, night-outs for a stylish and practical look in spring, summer, autumn, winter. The short sleeve shirt is an ideal gift for men/boyfriend/son/husband/father/brother.

WARM TIPS - Suitable for hand and machine wash at 40℃. Please refer to our size chart before purchasing.The color may slightly different from what it appears on the websites, due to different monitor settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like The Look, Just Not On Me!
reviews.reviewText: Really liked the look of this shirt. However, quickly realized this look is not for me! The fabric is nice and light and seems to be made nicely without any bad seams or any frays. However, the collar is a bit....different. It is not a typical fold collar but one that stays up. If you like the popped collar look, this is the shirt for you. It's a shame since I really liked the semi wrinkled material and the color. I will relegate this to laundry days!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight shirt
reviews.reviewText: Hard to find shirt without regular collar! These are great in warm weather, less sweat around the collar. I hope these will be durable for my husband is rough on clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It got as it should and is nice and lightweight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Much thinner than expected
reviews.reviewText: Living in a desert region, I appreciate thin clothing. But this shirt is verging on too thin, even for me. It's so light ant thin, I can barely feel it's on. And at first thought, I like it. I am concerned about its durability in the long run. I hope I'm wrong and it lasts a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs HUGE - not true to size
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure what happened here, but I ordered an XL which is my normal size and you could fit two of me in this shirt. This is odd because I see other reviewers stating that it runs true to size or even smaller. Perhaps I got a 2XL with an XL label, but I'm very disappointed in the fit.Pros:The fabric is nice and lightweight. Its wrinkly, which I think is deliberate as its intended as a casual beach shirtThe color looks good and the dye job is well doneBuild quality is also good with strong seams and no loose threadsCons:It being so large that I can't wear it, despite ordering my normal sizeThe collar. It wasn't too obvious in the product photos, but this is really a collarless shirt. They call it a banded collar in that it has a piece of fabric that sort of stands up like a priest's collar, but doesn't fold down like a "normal collar". Some people can pull off this look.... I'm not one of themBottom line: I would really like this shirt if it actually fit - but it's much too large. The moral of the story is to check the size details chart and make sure your dimensions fit the shirts dimensions. Aside from this, it's a good quality piece of clothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking shirt for going out
reviews.reviewText: This is a great looking shirt for a night out on the town or to dinner. It has a nice texture and light and thin which keeps me cool on these hot tropical nights. I like the olive-green color which looks good on me as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice fabric and color
reviews.reviewText: I got the light blue shirt for my husband for his birthday. The texture of the fabric is unique. It's soft and lightweight and has a nice feel to it. The collar is interesting, but I can see now in the picture how the model has the top button open. I may suggest that to my husband because buttoning it all the way up... it's an interesting style. I got my husband an XL but the large would have been a better choice. He wasn't sure which size would fit him even though he's typically a large. I should have stuck with his regular size.
